title: 100 Solar Lamps
description: Solar Lamps Pack: 100 models, day/night detection, multiple light modes, automaterial, and Nanite compatibility.
longDescription:
Solar Lamp Pack


Transform your gaming environments with our Solar Lamp Pack, designed to deliver exceptional visual aesthetics and advanced features. This pack includes 146 diverse solar lamp models, each optimized for high performance and easy integration into your Unreal Engine projects.


While our pack is designed to be easy to use, we include two videos to help you get the most out of your solar lamps:


Demo Video


Video Tutorial


⚠ WARNING ⚠ :


- The SunPosition plugin is required (native plugin)


- The environment (CityPark Environment) used for the demo images is not included


Key Features :


100 Solar Lamp Meshes


Our pack offers a vast collection of 100 solar lamp meshes, ranging from modern models to more classic styles. Each lamp is modeled to ensure a high level of detail and realism, while maintaining optimal performance with a maximum of 10,000 polygons per mesh.


Directional Light Detection


The lamps are equipped with a directional light detection function, allowing them to automatically turn on at dusk and turn off at dawn. This feature allows for increased immersion.


Multiple Lighting Modes


The lamps offer several lighting modes:


- Classic white light for an elegant and refined ambiance.


- Fire effect for a warm and welcoming ambiance.


- Automatic multi-color dimming range for dynamic and captivating lighting effects.


Proximity Activation: The lamps automatically turn on when a pawn approaches, adding dynamic lighting that reacts to the player's presence for increased immersion.


Automatic Materials


The materials of the lamps can be changed automatically, allowing for easy and quick customization.


Material options include:


Metal: For an industrial and modern look. With or without oxidation


Wood: For a rustic and natural touch.


Nanite compatibility


Our models are Nanite compatible, with simulated glass (fake glass) to maintain compatibility while providing a correct visual rendering.


Optimized LOD and Lightmaps


Each lamp has adjusted levels of detail (LOD) to ensure smooth performance. Lightmaps are also optimized.


Interactive presentation level


Included in the pack, an interactive presentation level allows you to test and visualize in real time the different functionalities of the lamps. Change lighting modes, explore material options and observe the effect of directional light detection in the environment.


Documentation and support:


Ease of use and integration:


Ease of use:


Our pack is designed to be easily integrated into your Unreal Engine projects. Whether you are an experienced developer or a beginner, you will find the lights easy to use thanks to an intuitive interface and well-designed Blueprints.


Various applications:


- Video games: Perfect for creating immersive gaming environments, whether for outdoor or indoor scenes.


- Architectural visualizations: Add a touch of realism to your visualizations with realistic and functional solar lights.


Support and update:


We are committed to providing customer support and updates
technicalDetails:
⚠ SunPosition plugin is required (native plugin) ⚠


Number of BluePrints: 3 BluePrints and 2 child BluePrints


Number of unique meshes: 100


Collision: unique auto-generated


Number of vertices: 8000 max


Triangle names: 13000 max


LOD: Yes


Lightmap: Yes


Number of materials and material instances:


- 6 materials, 1 AutoMaterial


- 17 material instances


- 9 material functions


- 2 lighting functions


Texture name: 32


- 22 textures


- 10 masks


Texture resolutions: 512 ➡ 2048


Supported development platforms:


Windows: Yes


Documentation: Video tutorial


Important/additional notes :


Our models are compatible with Nanite, with simulated glass, to maintain compatibility while providing a correct visual rendering.
